17
18#include "QRFinderPattern.h"
19
20#include <cmath>
21
22namespace ZXing {
23namespace QRCode {
24
25FinderPattern::FinderPattern(float posX, float posY, float estimatedModuleSize, int count) :
26 ResultPoint(posX, posY),
27 _estimatedModuleSize(estimatedModuleSize),
28 _count(count)
29{
30}
31
32/**
33* <p>Determines if this finder pattern "about equals" a finder pattern at the stated
34* position and size -- meaning, it is at nearly the same center with nearly the same size.</p>
35*/
36bool
37FinderPattern::aboutEquals(float moduleSize, float i, float j) const
38{
39 if (std::abs(i - y()) <= moduleSize && std::abs(j - x()) <= moduleSize) {
40 float moduleSizeDiff = std::abs(moduleSize - _estimatedModuleSize);
41 return moduleSizeDiff <= 1.0f || moduleSizeDiff <= _estimatedModuleSize;
42 }
43 return false;
44}
45
46/**
47* Combines this object's current estimate of a finder pattern position and module size
48* with a new estimate. It returns a new {@code FinderPattern} containing a weighted average
49* based on count.
50*/
51FinderPattern
52FinderPattern::combineEstimate(float i, float j, float newModuleSize) const
53{
54 int combinedCount = _count + 1;
55 float combinedX = (_count * x() + j) / combinedCount;
56 float combinedY = (_count * y() + i) / combinedCount;
57 float combinedModuleSize = (_count * _estimatedModuleSize + newModuleSize) / combinedCount;
58 return {combinedX, combinedY, combinedModuleSize, combinedCount};
59}
60
61} // QRCode
62} // ZXing
63
